title: Transfer account
body: I just migrated from the Philippines to the USA. Is there a way I can transfer my LoL account from Garena to NA server? I spent a lot of money on that account. I also spent a lot of time and effort to climb from Bronze 4 to Silver 1.

replies.body: Since Garena's servers are hosted a bit differently, we don't have the ability to transfer accounts out of their servers to the NA servers.
